pages.text: By infusing either a $(d)Glimmer of Hope$() or $(d)Supernatrual Strength$() into an apple, the power that those bits of power hold grows twofold, resulting in much more practical application of such power.
The $(bold)$(6)Apple of Strength$() holds much more power than the $(d)Supernatural Strength$(), anyone who has one of these on hand should be considered an extraordinary danger to others.
The $(bold)$(6)Apple of Light$() holds much more power than the $(d)Glimmer of Hope$(), making great use for either desperate escapes or quick mining.
